entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
